document_data.name: Brick
document_data.basicrefs: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|3}}
document_data.refs2e: {{Cite organized play/LC/Revenge Is Harder than Stone|19}}
document_data.mainbody: '''Brick''' was a [[gnome|gnomish]] highsunfeat dish from the city of [[Ravens Bluff]] in [[the Vast]].
document_data.Description: Brick was an aptly-named [[wheat]] [[bread]] loaf, stuffed with [[mushroom]]s and [[cheddar]], often served with gnomish pale [[ale]]s, such as [[Rockgrit]], [[Stint]], or [[Greentart]]. The loaf was baked until it formed a crunchy shell and served with a portion of white sauce.
document_data.History: Brick was a staple of a gnomish out-of-the way café in Ravens Bluff called [[Le PoTeete Café]] in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. The only other highsunfeat alternative on the menu was [[Rosto]], a type of a [[sandwich]].
